title: New: MONEY – The Amazing Sessions
body:
I’ve said it before, and I’ll say it again, because quite frankly, it bears repeating: **MONEY** are the UK’s most exciting new band.

With a couple of single releases under their belts, and a fanbase increasing by the day, it’s surely only a question of time before they’re performing to several hundred people a night. With their majestic, all encompassing sound and Jamie’s powerful lyricism, they’re a band to become enthralled by and obsessed with, perfectly portrayed by this stellar session for [Amazing Radio](amazingradio.co.uk/).

Five tracks, including two previously unheard numbers in the form of _Black_ and _Hold Me Forever_, alongside recent 7″ releases _Letter To Yesterday_ / _SOLONG (GODISDEAD)_ and _Goodnight London_, it’s one of those few live sessions that’s truly deserving of a full release. _“Every boy I’ve ever loved, and every girl I’ve ever loved, will close their eyes, and sing goodnight London”_

With a couple of single releases under their belts, and a fanbase increasing by the day, it’s surely only a question of time before they’re performing to several hundred people a night. \[…\]
